app.title: Mortgage Management
app.subtitle: App for financial advisors
add.first.case: Add your first case or import data.
onboarding.desc: This app helps you manage mortgage cases step by step. Take a quick tour of the main features.
onboarding.dashboard.desc: On the main page you will find an overview of all cases, quick filters, statistics and charts. You can filter, search and export data here.
onboarding.workflow.desc: Each case contains 14 workflow steps. Track progress, edit deadlines, notes, add attachments and mark completed steps.
onboarding.add.desc: Add a new case with the 'Add case' button. You can also import data from CSV/JSON or edit an existing case.
onboarding.personalize.desc: Customize your dashboard, switch light/dark/blue/high-contrast mode, increase font size or set preferred sections.
onboarding.help.desc: Click the question mark icon in the top right at any time to restart the guide or view help.
